org.turbogwt.mvp.databind

Interface DatabindUiHandler

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Binding<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BindingImpl

    public interface DatabindUiHandler
    An interface that must be implemented by the Presenter supporting databind.
    Author:
    Danilo Reinert

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onValueChanged(String id, Object value)
      Must be called by View when some bound widget changes value.

    • Method Detail

      • onValueChanged

        void onValueChanged(String id,
                  Object value)
        Must be called by View when some bound widget changes value.
        Parameters:
        id - property id
        value - new value from view (may need unformatting)
